title: ocp\util::sanitizehtml() uses array_walk_recursive() on objects
body:
which can make a lotta mess when doing it on an object that contains references to it's parent.
it seems like that is what's happening when importing events by clicking on an ics file:
```
[wed feb 20 05:33:47 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php stack trace:, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files
[wed feb 20 05:33:47 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   1. {main}() /home/tol/owncloud/core/index.php:0, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files
[wed feb 20 05:33:47 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   2. oc::handlerequest() /home/tol/owncloud/core/index.php:28, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files
[wed feb 20 05:33:47 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   3. oc_router->match() /home/tol/owncloud/core/lib/base.php:586, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files
[wed feb 20 05:33:47 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   4. call_user_func() /home/tol/owncloud/core/lib/router.php:127, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files
[wed feb 20 05:33:47 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   5. oc::loadappscriptfile() /home/tol/owncloud/core/lib/router.php:127, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files
[wed feb 20 05:33:47 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   6. require_once() /home/tol/owncloud/core/lib/base.php:652, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files
[wed feb 20 05:33:47 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   7. oc_template->printpage() /home/tol/owncloud/apps/calendar/ajax/import/dialog.php:13, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files
[wed feb 20 05:33:47 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   8. oc_template->fetchpage() /home/tol/owncloud/core/lib/template.php:394, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files
[wed feb 20 05:33:47 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   9. oc_template->_fetch() /home/tol/owncloud/core/lib/template.php:412, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files
[wed feb 20 05:33:47 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php  10. include() /home/tol/owncloud/core/lib/template.php:449, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files
[wed feb 20 05:33:47 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php  11. ocp\\util::sanitizehtml() /home/tol/owncloud/apps/calendar/templates/part.import.php:10, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files
[wed feb 20 05:33:47 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php  12. oc_util::sanitizehtml() /home/tol/owncloud/core/lib/public/util.php:352, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files
[wed feb 20 05:33:47 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php  13. array_walk_recursive() /home/tol/owncloud/core/lib/util.php:508, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files
[wed feb 20 05:33:47 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php  14. oc_util::sanitizehtml() /home/tol/owncloud/core/lib/util.php:508, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files
[wed feb 20 05:33:47 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php  15. array_walk_recursive() /home/tol/owncloud/core/lib/util.php:508, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files
```
and so on ;)

/cc @lukasreschke
